text: Play It Again, Sam is a 1972 American comedy movie directed by Herbert Ross and based on the 1969 play of the same name by Woody Allen (who also stars). It stars Diane Keaton, Tomy Roberts, Susan Anspach, Jerry Lacy, Jennifer Salt and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross Category:Movies based on plays
title: Play It Again, Sam (movie)
